Articles.Content:
While being chased by a swarm of Cruz Missiles, the good ship ButterChameleon II: LRM pulls a trick out of her hat and stops them in mid-air, causing them all to drop harmlessly (well, mostly harmless) the 48 kilometers to the ocean surface.

Herman Kerman from KSC PAO was quoted as saying, "The mission continues to proceed exactly as planned. I have no comment regarding the rumors of a so-called forcefield or whether we are, or are not equipping our drones with anti-missile technology."

Edited August 29, 2016 by dire
